algorithm_technique: Precomputation of combinations and DP states for stage assignments.
Combinatorics and modular exponentiation for score assignments.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate ways to assign n performers to x stages and score bands with y scores.
problem_summary_technical: Combines ways to partition performers into bands (DP) with ways to assign scores (powers).
time_complexity: O(max_n^2 + max_y * min(max_n, max_x) + min(n, x))
key_insights: The problem breaks down into two independent parts: stage assignment and score assignment.
Stage assignment can be modeled using DP where DP[i][j] is ways to assign i performers to j stages.
Score assignment involves choosing i bands out of x and assigning scores, leading to powers.
